full_summary:
### Title
#### (English) Accelerating Backlog Resolution with Intelligent Automation and Augmentation
#### (Français) Accélération de la résolution des retards grâce à l'automatisation et à l'augmentation intelligentes
---

### Reference Number
WS4354024052-Doc4355743034

### Tender Type
Selectively tendered Competitive Request for Proposal

### Key Dates

* Publication Date: Tuesday, December 27, 2023
* Amendment Date: Monday, January 8, 2024
* Closing Date: Friday, January 19, 2024 at 2:00 PM ET

### Expected Contract Duration
31st January, 2024 to 31st March, 2024

### Category
Business Intelligence and Data Analysis Software (UNSPSC: *43232314)

### Description
To accelerate backlog resolution, the Procuring Department seeks to engage a service provider to implement Intelligent Automation and Augmentation solutions. This will facilitate efficient and effective processing, workflow analytics, decision-making, and predictive insights.

### Procurement Method
Competitive, Selective Tendering (Commodity Code: Business Intelligence and Data Analysis Software)

### Targeted Market
The services to be procured are subject to Canada's various trade agreements, which include Canada-Ukraine Free Trade Agreement (CUFTA), World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA), and Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA).

### Delivery Locations
Delivery is required in the National Capital Region, specifically in the Région de la capitale nationale (RCN).

### Contact Information
To learn more or submit offers, please refer to the tender announcement document available at [https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/18376862?extsite=MTgzNzY4NjJfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==][1]

Peter Lessard (Spécialiste AC/AC, PSPC/TPSGC) may be reachable at peter.lessard@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca for any inquiries. No phone number or fax is available at this time.

### [1]: https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/18376862?extsite=MTgzNzY4NjJfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==
